description: This table contains the scheduling instructions from the case request order when the case is created from an order.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORDER_SCHED_TXT
columns.description: This column contains the scheduling instructions from the case request order when the case is created from an order.
